DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to check if Naloxone induce an inhibiting effect on the analgesic effect of paracetamol in healthy volunteer, using evoked potentials.
DOC.brief_title: Impact of Naloxone on the Analgesic Effect of Paracetamol in Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: Double Blind, cross-over study in healthy volunteers.
DOC.criteria: Healthy men between 18 and 40 years old written consent given Naloxone or paracetamol hypersensibility Excessive consumption of alcohol, tobacco, coffee, tea or toxicomania Concomitant medication
